name: Ruins Test
description: Before the battle, a cinematic shows what appears to be a youngerSamus Aranviewing the same wall paintings shown during the boss battle, revealing that she has visited theroomwhile living withOld Birdand theChozo. As a child, Samus made a small engraving on the base of the mural, depicting herself and two Chozo (most likely Old Bird andGray Voice). Samus later revisits the Ruins Test as an adult during herZero Mission, after infiltrating theSpace Pirate Mother Shipin herZero Suit.

attributes.Location: Top of the ruins , Chozo Ruins
attributes.Reward: Legendary Power Suit ; Gravity Suit , Plasma Beam , Space Jump unlocked

name: Commander Nemo
description: After not contacting Samus in a long time, Commander Nemo called for Samus inYear 20X5. AtGalactic Federation Police HQ, he briefed Samus on her new mission, explaining that theMetroid capsulehad been stolen from theSpace Research Vessel MarinabySpace Piratesa month earlier. With theFederation Policeunable to invade Zebes, Nemo assigned Samus to defeat the Metroids and Mother Brain. Concerned that Samus was out of practice, Nemo also decided to test her skills by playingVolleyballon theFamily...

name: Flaahgra
description: Flaahgrais an enormous mutated plant-like creature inMetroid Primeand is the main boss of theChozo Ruins.

attributes.Attacks: Toxic blasts, ability to grow toxic plants , a pair of vicious scythes on its 'forearms', Flaahgra Tentacles .
attributes.Weakness: Vulnerable to Morph Ball Bombs at its roots; stunned by concentrated weapons fire; requires constant concentrated sunlight provided by reflecting panels.

name: Mecha Ridley
description: Mecha RidleyMetroid: Zero Mission artwork of Mecha RidleyFeatured inMetroid: Zero MissionLocationShip's last chamber,Space Pirate Mother ShipAttacksMissiles, claws, fireballs, lasersWeaknessMissilesandSuper MissilesBattle Music"Vs. Mecha Ridley"Reward(s)Countdown

attributes.Location: Ship's last chamber , Space Pirate Mother Ship

name: Commander Mauk
description: A few years after the Zebes incident Mauk becomes a Galactic Federation Marine Commander. He is seen discovering many dead bodies killed byMetroids. His surprise indicates that he may be the first (or among the first) of the Federation to independently learn of the deadly potential of the Metroids, before anyone knew what the cause could have been. He also recognized the smell the Metroids left behind onZebes, from many years ago.

name: Bishop
description: Bishop(ビショップ,Bishoppu?)is a major antagonist inMetroid EX, serving asGreed's general of knowledge. Calling himself "beguiling", Bishop is a robed figure with bull horns, an eye-like mouth in his forehead (and two eyes without pupils) and shoulderpads. He is summoned by Greed and tasked with going to thegraveyard planetto awaitSamus Aran. Bishop reports the insignificant news of theDeadly Six Stars' complete annihilation, and Samus' recovery of five out of sevenData Capsulescontaining her stol...

name: PFC X. Dominguez
description: Private First Class X. Dominguezwas a medic on theG.F.S.Tyrwhen it crash-landed on Aether, prior to the events ofMetroid Prime 2: Echoes. Dominguez's fate on planetAetheris unknown.

attributes.Death: Unknown, most likely killed by Dark Splinters .
attributes.Affiliation: Galactic Federation GFMC Task Force Herakles

name: Gandrayda
description: Gandraydais aBounty Hunterwho appears inMetroid Prime 3: Corruption.

attributes.Death: Defeated by Samus Aran at the Pirate Homeworld , due to Phazon corruption.
attributes.Weapon: Various electricity-based weapons, able to morph into a wide variety of forms.
attributes.Affiliation: Freelance Bounty Hunter (Often employed by the Galactic Federation

name: Body Snatcher
description: TheBody Snatcher(乗っ取りの スナッチ,Nottori no sunatchi?)is an individual featured in chapter 17, volume 3 ofSamus and Joey. His species is unknown, but he wears a cat-like body suit and has double-jointed arms. The structure of the Snatcher's pelvis and legs resembles that of thePower Suit. The Body Snatcher is a member of theDominion. He is capable of "snatching" a person's mind through unknown means, which he demonstrated onJoey Apronika. Using Joey to lureSamus Aranto theMarine Park, he traps Sam...

name: Mari Yoshimura #2
description: Samus and Mari Yoshimura checked intoHotel New Galaxythe night before disembarking on their new mission. Their room was visited by abellboy, which was actually aMetroidassassin in disguise. Mari Yo jumped in the way of the Metroid as it made an attempt on Samus's life, and was mortally wounded by the Metroid's knife. This bought Samus enough time to react and kill the Metroid, but Mari Yo died in her arms. Furious, Samus vowed to killMother Brainas revenge.

attributes.Death: Killed by bellboy at Hotel New Galaxy in Year 20X5

name: Helios
description: Heliosis the guardian ofElysia'sLeviathan. This mechanoid looks like a small round sphere with four tentacle-arm like appendages. He is the prime robot of a group ofSwarmbots, also inhabiting the Leviathan. Helios has seven forms. All but the final form are invulnerable, and he only takes this form after being hit in his other forms many times.

name: SPC F. Triplette
description: Specialist F. Triplettewas aGalactic Federation Troopergunner specialist inMetroid Prime 2: Echoes, part ofForce One. He also seems to refer toCaptain A.C. Exeteras "Ace", after the initials "ACE". Triplette is seen warning Exeter of the impending invasion ofDark Splinters, and is last seen repellingDark Splinterswith a bayonet, before one leaps into the air and attacks, partially impaling him, which instantly kills him. Triplette's corpse is found in theGFMC Compound.

attributes.Death: Impaled in torso by Dark Splinter in GFMC Compound within 30 days prior to Metroid Prime 2: Echoes

name: Zameel
description: Zameel personally receivedSamus Aran's stolenMissile LauncherfromGreed. Samus encounters him inBrigandiaon the planetOutlaw, and he begins going on a rampage. His henchmen try to kill Samus, who dispatches them and shoots Zameel with herPower Beam, however, it has no effect.

attributes.Death: Caught in the explosion of a reflected Super Missile , thrown back at him by Samus Aran .

name: Sylux
description: Description non trouvée.

attributes.Affiliation: Sworn enemy of Samus Aran and the Galactic Federation .

name: Golon
description: Golon(ゴロン,Goron?)is the cruel dictator ofMaru, known for his obsession with roundness. He swiftly punishes those who are not round (who he calls "ugly") by imprisoning them, forcing many of the planet's non-round citizens to don suits to appear round. Golon resembles a toad, and possesses both an ability to use its tongue like a toad andSamus Aran's stolenMorph Ball, which he keeps in a slot in his chest.Joey Apronikais brought to him for entertainment, but fails. Golon prepares to arrest him...

name: Ryan Powell (Marine)
description: Ryan Powellwas a FederationPED Trooperkilled during theSpace Pirateattack on theGalactic FederationshipValhalla. He was first found dead and identified by theGalactic Federation Reconnaissance Dronein theMetroid Prime 3: Corruption Previewchannel. His body is located in theControl Room.

attributes.Death: Likely shot to death by Space Pirate weaponry.

name: Bottle Ship P.A. Announcer
description: TheBottle Ship P.A. Announceris a feminine voice used for theBOTTLE SHIP's public address system, which is often heard inElevators. The voice sounds very flat and matter-of-fact, and coupled with unnatural pauses in her speech suggests the voice is artificial and computer-generated rather than pre-recorded. It is unknown whether this computer is related toMBor whether the BOTTLE SHIP had another, less advanced computer or AI.

name: Miguel Luis Garcia
description: After Samus kills severalDark Troopers, and it is proven that once they were affected by theblack fogthen they could not be saved, he states that she "at least showed them some mercy." Miguel is then seen fleeing with the rest of his group from adimensional riftand more black fog. He is one of the "guardians of the light" summoned byU-Mosto save theLuminoth, though he shows no interest in doing so. Next, he scoldsKlaus Schneiderfor letting Samus go to theAgon Templealone, and takesJeff McClou...

name: Ensign
description: TheEnsignis a crew member on board theG.F.S.Olympus. He is a genericMale Fleet Trooperstationed to the left in theFlag Bridge. Before theOlympusfollows the capturedLeviathan Battleshipinto awormholetoPhaaze, he briefly speaks toFleet Admiral Castor Daneto inform him of Samus' arrival. He is unseen in the cutscene.

name: Aurora Unit 217
description: Aurora Unit 217is aGalactic FederationAurora Unit. Aurora Unit 217 was assigned a male persona. He was originally designed to supportGF Naval Base Demeter, though was assigned toSkyTownshortly afterthe Treaty of Elysiawas signed. He acts as SkyTown's administrator, directing the mechanoids on the planet. 217 has delivered a large amount of tactical intelligence, along with valuable stellar and interstellar research data. He works well with the Elysian mechanoids and enjoys the productive work...

name: SkyTown announcer
description: It is first heard when Samus attempts tointerfacewithAurora Unit 217, by saying that the Aurora Unit requires repair. It then opens a hatch to the maintenance level of itsChamber, where Samusvaccinates217. After Samus repairs thecircuit boardsthere followingGhor's death, 217 initiates a migration of SkyTown towards theLeviathan Shield. When the process is complete, the voice can be heard again saying "SKYTOWN MIGRATION COMPLETE."

name: Blood monkey
description: Several pieces of artwork inPrime'sConcept Galleryuse "monkey" to describe rooms and architecture. Design notes for several rooms refer to them as floors of the "monkey lair", and repeated references are made to "monkey hole[s]". This artwork was evidently used to create the rooms in the final game, as mapping data refers toTotem Accessas "Monkey_Hallway",Burn Domeas "Monkey Lower",Dynamoas "Monkey_Shaft", andRuined Galleryas "MonkeyUpper". The Burn Dome seems particularly connected to BloodM...

name: Bartender and Cupcake
description: The "bartender" and "Cupcake" are two unnamed characters that appear only in the first chapter ofMetroid EX. The former is the proprietor of the saloon inBrigandia,Outlaw, while the latter is a waitress at the location. "Cupcake" is a derogatory nickname given to her by a member of theGreed Corps.

name: Joey Apronika
description: Joey Apronika(ジョイ · アポロニカ,Joy Aporonika?)is the protagonist of the manga seriesSamus and Joeyand its sequel series,Metroid EX. He is introduced on the frontier planetLibertywith his grandfathers and a small community. He wishes to train withSamus Aranafter she saved him from aSpace Pirateraid, so he can protect his remaining family. Joey has three concealed wheels in each of his shoes that allow him to move and turn at high velocity, as well as climbing spikes that can project from the front ...

name: Rundas
description: Rundas was born onPhrygis, a moon of the planetBes IIIknown mainly for ice mining. Phrygisians are commonly able to manipulate and generate ice. However, Rundas was one of very few to use this ability as a Hunter.

attributes.Homeworld: Phrygis , a moon of planet Bes III .
attributes.Death: Terminated by his own abilities on planet Bryyo
attributes.Affiliation: Bounty Hunter Galactic Federation Space Pirates

name: SPC B. Reevs
description: Reevs was concerned about the hiveForce Twowas hiding in, feeling that the interconnected nature of the hives meant that they were likely to attract attention with their activities and to provoke attacks from other nearby hives.

attributes.Death: Brutally murdered by Splinters in Command Chamber within 30 days prior to Metroid Prime 2: Echoes

name: U-ton
description: However, it is quickly revealed that there are more sinister intentions to the bioroid, as Delta III was created by an unknown corporation for use in war, though it proved ineffective and went berserk when it was scheduled to be destroyed. It was responsible for the destruction of a demolition ship.An unnamed manemployed Samus to hunt it down and destroy it, when it took refuge nearDiesel'sJunk Quixote. Samus realizes U-ton is the Bioroid, and rushes to save Joey.

name: LCDR T. Huxley
description: PFC M. Veroniclaims to have spoken to a male doctor aboutPFC G. Haley's condition, indicating the gender of either Huxley orPFC X. Dominguez, the only other medic.

attributes.Death: Unknown, most likely killed by Dark Splinters.
attributes.Affiliation: Galactic Federation , GFMC Task Force Herakles

name: Escort Seven
description: "Escort Seven" is a name in unused dialogue, used to refer to an unseenFederation Marinecharacter inMetroid Prime 3: Corruption. Upon approaching theG.F.S.Olympus, Escort SevencontactsSamusthrough thetransmission consolein herGunshipand asks her to transmit heridentity code. Once she has done so, he welcomes her on the Federation's behalf, and instructs her to land her Gunship inDocking Bay 5. He is not heard from for the rest of the game.

attributes.Affiliation: Galactic Federation Marine Corps Seventh Fleet

name: Lily Thran
description: Samus and the group arrive in theGenerator Roomto restore power, and find severalFederation Marinebodies with no visible wounds. Lily states she has found a pulse, and they soon became reanimated by theblack fog. Samus kills them all, against the opinions of the survivors, and Lily analyzes their again fallen corpses. She states that once they were affected by the black fog then they could not be saved.

attributes.Homeworld: Unknown, said to have a hometown
attributes.Death: Killed by a group of large creatures during the final battle

name: PFC P. Wills
description: Private First Class P. Willswas a tech worker, part ofGFMC Task Force Herakleswho, like the rest of the troops, was killed when theDark Splintersinvaded. Their body was most likely later made into aDark Trooper, which would have been destroyed by Samus.

attributes.Death: Unknown, most likely killed by Dark Splinters.
attributes.Affiliation: Galactic Federation GFMC Task Force Herakles

name: CDR K. Starling
description: Commander K. Starlingwas the pilot of theAnhur-class patrol ship, theG.F.S.Tyr. Starling landed theTyron the planetAetherwhile pursuing aSpace Pirate starshipthat crash-landed there. The pilot was presumably killed along with the rest of the crew by a swarm ofDark Splinters, although it is possible Starling was killed in the crash. Starling's body was never identified.

attributes.Death: Unknown, likely either killed by Dark Splinters, or in the crash.
